name: cloudflare-workers-openapi

scripts.deploy:ui: cd ui && npm ci --no-audit --no-fund && npm run build && npx --yes wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name tts-sub --branch main --commit-dirty
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:ui

description: A high-performance Cloudflare Worker that provides free, high-quality Text-to-Speech (TTS) audio with synchronized subtitle metadata using Microsoft Edge's online TTS service.
